BR_text.BRsummary: Initial build fails on German localized OS (prob. erroneous unit tests)
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
 
 On a German localized system the decimal separator in a number format is a comma instead of a dot. The asserts expect a dot though, hence 3 of the tests fail while the values seem to be ok.
 Building without tests works ok so far, so it seems to be a minor unit test bug only.
 <denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behavior</denchmark-h>
 
 Initial build success
 <denchmark-h:h3>Error Message</denchmark-h>

 <denchmark-h:h2>How to Reproduce?</denchmark-h>
 
 It's an initial build, code cloned on Sept. 14th 2020, run on a German localized ubuntu. Code is unchanged.
 <denchmark-h:h3>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
 
 (Paste the commands you ran that produced the error.)
 
 ./gradlew build
 
 <denchmark-h:h2>What have you tried to solve it?</denchmark-h>
 
 
 built without tests
